ipacu_response.state: UPDATING | INITIALIZING | TRANSMIT DISABLED | WAITING FOR HUB COMM | ATTEMPTING LOGIN | ONLINE | OFFLINE | SWITCH SAT
ipacu_response.acustate: OFFLINE, TxInhibit active | SIGNAL ACQUISITION, TxInhibit active | ONLINE, TxInhibit active | ONLINE, TxInhibit inactive
ipacu_response.termstate: INITIAL PHASE | TRANSMIT DISABLED | TRANSMIT ENABLED | CW | ANTENNA POINTING
